20110130140156.000|20110130140157.000|CC1| FOR TEN YEARS, AND HAS BEEN    
20110130140157.000|20110130140158.000|CC1| PUTTING UP WITH THIS

20110130140213.000|20110130140214.000|CC1|>> I SEE A LITTLE BIT

20110130140434.000|20110130140435.000|CC1|YEAH, EVERYTHING'S NOT FLOATING

20110130140439.000|20110130140441.000|CC1|>> NOW, UM, AS FAR AS SOME      
20110130140441.000|20110130140442.000|CC1|OF THE OVERALL DESIGN

20110130140456.000|20110130140457.000|CC1|>> USUALLY IN MY INITIAL        
20110130140457.000|20110130140458.000|CC1|MEETING, WE DON'T TALK          
20110130140458.000|20110130140459.000|CC1|DESIGN AT ALL.                  
20110130140459.000|20110130140501.000|CC1|I JUST ASK QUESTIONS,           
20110130140501.000|20110130140502.000|CC1|LOTS OF QUESTIONS,              
20110130140502.000|20110130140504.000|CC1|ABOUT HOW THEY SHOP,            
20110130140504.000|20110130140505.000|CC1|HOW THEY COOK,                  
20110130140505.000|20110130140506.000|CC1|WHAT THEY USE THEIR SPACE FOR.

20110130140517.000|20110130140518.000|CC1|>> AND WHAT ABOUT THE LOOK      
20110130140518.000|20110130140519.000|CC1|OF HER KITCHEN?                 
20110130140519.000|20110130140520.000|CC1|THAT'S WHERE A LOT OF PEOPLE    
20110130140520.000|20110130140521.000|CC1|GET HUNG UP ON JUST

20110130140529.000|20110130140530.000|CC1|OF POTTERY THAT SHE             
20110130140530.000|20110130140531.000|CC1|WANTS TO DISPLAY.               
20110130140531.000|20110130140533.000|CC1|UM, ALSO SHE USES IT EVERY DAY, 
20110130140533.000|20110130140534.000|CC1|SO IT HAD TO BE                 
20110130140534.000|20110130140535.000|CC1|KIND OF MULTI-PURPOSE.          
20110130140535.000|20110130140536.000|CC1|WE WANTED TO HAVE               
20110130140536.000|20110130140537.000|CC1|SOME DISPLAY AREA,              
20110130140537.000|20110130140538.000|CC1|AND IT HAD TO COORDINATE        
20110130140538.000|20110130140539.000|CC1|WITH THE WOOD TONE              
20110130140539.000|20110130140540.000|CC1|OF THE CABINETRY.               
20110130140540.000|20110130140541.000|CC1|SHE LIKES WOOD TONE             
20110130140541.000|20110130140543.000|CC1|AS OPPOSED TO PAINT--           
20110130140543.000|20110130140544.000|CC1|SHE HAD PAINTED BEFORE.         
20110130140544.000|20110130140545.000|CC1|SO, WE CAME UP WITH             
20110130140545.000|20110130140547.000|CC1|KIND OF A NEUTRAL MIDDLE BROWN. 
20110130140547.000|20110130140548.000|CC1|>> OH, THERE YOU GO. YEAH.      
20110130140548.000|20110130140549.000|CC1|>> NOT TOO DARK, NOT TOO LIGHT. 
20110130140549.000|20110130140550.000|CC1|IT'S GOT A LITTLE BIT

20110130140552.000|20110130140553.000|CC1|>> THAT'S PERFECT.              
20110130140553.000|20110130140554.000|CC1|NOW, WHAT ABOUT COUNTERTOP?     
20110130140554.000|20110130140555.000|CC1|I KNOW THAT WHEN PEOPLE GET TO, 
20110130140555.000|20110130140557.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, THE DECISIONS--       
20110130140557.000|20110130140558.000|CC1|THERE'S SO MANY DECISIONS       
20110130140558.000|20110130140559.000|CC1|IN A KITCHEN, BUT THEN          
20110130140559.000|20110130140600.000|CC1|WHEN YOU GET TO COUNTERTOPS,    
20110130140600.000|20110130140601.000|CC1|THERE'S SO MANY TO CHOOSE FROM. 
20110130140601.000|20110130140603.000|CC1|>> YES, THE DENOVA LINE OFFERS  
20110130140603.000|20110130140605.000|CC1|GRANITE, QUARTZ,                
20110130140605.000|20110130140606.000|CC1|AND SOLID-SURFACE,              
20110130140606.000|20110130140607.000|CC1|WHICH IS TYPICAL                
20110130140607.000|20110130140608.000|CC1|OF WHAT YOU SEE OUT THERE.      
20110130140608.000|20110130140609.000|CC1|WE WENT, ACTUALLY,              
20110130140609.000|20110130140611.000|CC1|WITH A QUARTZ PRODUCT, WHICH IS 
20110130140611.000|20110130140612.000|CC1|A MAINTENANCE-FREE PRODUCT.     
20110130140612.000|20110130140613.000|CC1|>> OH, BOY.                     
20110130140613.000|20110130140614.000|CC1|>> IT'S COLD, LIKE STONE.       
20110130140614.000|20110130140615.000|CC1|IT'S HEAVY, LIKE STONE,         
20110130140615.000|20110130140617.000|CC1|SO IT'S GREAT FOR BAKING,

20110130140620.000|20110130140621.000|CC1|>> BOY, THAT'S--

20110130140627.000|20110130140628.000|CC1| FOR LINDA'S KITCHEN,           
20110130140628.000|20110130140629.000|CC1| JOE HAS A SIMPLE SOLUTION      
20110130140629.000|20110130140630.000|CC1| THAT MIGHT BE                  
20110130140630.000|20110130140631.000|CC1| JUST RIGHT FOR YOURS.          
20110130140631.000|20110130140632.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20110130140631.000|20110130140632.000|CC1|>> HERE'S A SIMPLE SOLUTION     
20110130140632.000|20110130140633.000|CC1|THAT HOME COOKS ARE GONNA LOVE. 
20110130140633.000|20110130140635.000|CC1|IT'S MAKING A RECIPE CARD HOLDER
20110130140635.000|20110130140637.000|CC1|WITH A-- OUT OF A CLOTHESPIN.   
20110130140637.000|20110130140638.000|CC1|START WITH A WOODEN CLOTHESPIN, 
20110130140638.000|20110130140640.000|CC1|THE SPRING TYPE, AND THEN       
20110130140640.000|20110130140641.000|CC1|GET A PAIR OF SNIPS             
20110130140641.000|20110130140642.000|CC1|AND CUT OFF ABOUT               
20110130140642.000|20110130140643.000|CC1|A HALF INCH OF THE LEG.         
20110130140643.000|20110130140644.000|CC1|YOU COULD ALSO USE              
20110130140644.000|20110130140646.000|CC1|A HACKSAW OR A WOOD SAW,        
20110130140646.000|20110130140647.000|CC1|BUT THIS WORKS JUST AS WELL.    
20110130140647.000|20110130140649.000|CC1|AND THEN, A DRILL               
20110130140649.000|20110130140650.000|CC1|WITH A 3/16th" BIT.             
20110130140650.000|20110130140652.000|CC1|DRILL A HOLE THROUGH            
20110130140652.000|20110130140654.000|CC1|THE LONG LEG.                   
20110130140654.000|20110130140655.000|CC1|WHAT WE'RE GONNA DO             
20110130140655.000|20110130140657.000|CC1|IS USE THAT HOLE,               
20110130140657.000|20110130140658.000|CC1|PUT A SCREW THROUGH,            
20110130140658.000|20110130140659.000|CC1|AND WE'RE GONNA ATTACH IT       
20110130140659.000|20110130140701.000|CC1|TO THE UNDERSIDE OF A CABINET.  
20110130140701.000|20110130140702.000|CC1|THIS IS WHERE                   
20110130140702.000|20110130140703.000|CC1|THE CABINET FACE FRAME          
20110130140703.000|20110130140705.000|CC1|HANGS DOWN                      
20110130140705.000|20110130140707.000|CC1|FROM THE UPPER CABINET.         
20110130140707.000|20110130140708.000|CC1|AND WE'RE GONNA RUN             
20110130140708.000|20110130140713.000|CC1|A SCREW IN THERE.               
20110130140713.000|20110130140714.000|CC1|YOU MAKE IT NICE AND TIGHT      
20110130140714.000|20110130140715.000|CC1|SO THAT THE CLOTHESPIN          
20110130140715.000|20110130140716.000|CC1|WILL STAY UP IN--               
20110130140716.000|20110130140717.000|CC1|UP, HIDDEN BEHIND,              
20110130140717.000|20110130140718.000|CC1|AND WHENEVER YOU NEED IT,       
20110130140718.000|20110130140720.000|CC1|YOU SWING IT DOWN,              
20110130140720.000|20110130140721.000|CC1|AND YOU CAN CLIP YOUR RECIPE    
20110130140721.000|20110130140722.000|CC1|RIGHT TO IT.                    
20110130140722.000|20110130140723.000|CC1|THAT KEEPS THE RECIPE           
20110130140723.000|20110130140724.000|CC1|RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU           
20110130140724.000|20110130140725.000|CC1|SO YOU CAN SEE IT,              
20110130140725.000|20110130140726.000|CC1|BUT OFF THE COUNTER,
